price: 2. Usuk Yalla, kaak-sa Qibaada cakkisita Yalli mayan, usuk dudda- le manoleeh maraba, usuk isi ginoh Amol yaniih isi ginoh maceyta.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ ٱلۡقَيُّومُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa al-ḥayu al-qayūmu
translations: the Sustainer of all that exists
